Callback7Header: Enter the Rimescar Cavern and acquire the {ITEM}.
Callback9Header: Return the Grizzly's Maul to Greganoch
Name: Hammer of the Champion
Phase10Description: I have obtained the storied Grizzly's Maul. I should return it to Greganoch of the Bear Tribe.
Phase5Description: Greganoch of the Bear Tribe has asked that I reclaim the Grizzly's Maul. The tribe's champion who wielded the weapon was taken to the Rimescar Cavern.
Toast: Retrieve a fabled weapon from the Rimescar Cavern.
